title: NSE discontinues weekly expiries for Bank Nifty
description: On the BSE, the weekly index derivatives contracts on Sensex 50 will be discontinued with effect from November 14. Weekly contracts of BSE's Bankex will also be discontinued from November 18.
excerpt: On the BSE, the weekly index derivatives contracts on Sensex 50 will be discontinued with effect from November 14. Weekly contracts of BSE's Bankex will also be discontinued from November 18.
